line.comment: * Cannot claim in the first 15 minutes.
* Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
* Cannot claim a sector we own.
* Cannot claim a protectorate.
* Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (difficulty setting), and that the galaxy expansion is not set to none.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
* Unclaimable sectors, like the one with the OCV main portal.
* There is a bug that return owned sector to [Unknown] for some reason. This makes sure that we don't claim again those sectors (very rare bug).
* At this point, Player can claim everything.
* === NPC Only below. ===
* Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
* Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally. Zero Hour- Except during Global Alliance
* Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad. Cannot claim unknown sectors adjacent to player either.
* Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
* Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
* Zero Hour AI: -1=full defense ; 0=cautious ; 1=baseline (vanilla Mayhem 3) ; 2=confident ; 3=reckless
* full defense AI cannot claim any sectors
* cautious AI can only claim adjacent sectors

sval.val: Cannot claim in the first 15 minutes.
Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
Cannot claim a sector we own.
Cannot claim a protectorate.
Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (difficulty setting), and that the galaxy expansion is not set to none.
Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
Unclaimable sectors, like the one with the OCV main portal.
There is a bug that return owned sector to [Unknown] for some reason. This makes sure that we don't claim again those sectors (very rare bug).
At this point, Player can claim everything.
=== NPC Only below. ===
Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally. Zero Hour- Except during Global Alliance
Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad. Cannot claim unknown sectors adjacent to player either.
Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
Zero Hour AI: -1=full defense ; 0=cautious ; 1=baseline (vanilla Mayhem 3) ; 2=confident ; 3=reckless
full defense AI cannot claim any sectors
cautious AI can only claim adjacent sectors
